snippet: Some visitors to the city stay in well-appointed houses and apartments while the occupants are elsewhere, submerging themselves perfectly in the mind-set of a certain kind of New Yorker.
abstract: Ginia Bellafante Big City column on One Fine Stay, a kind of virtual hotel service that matches visitors to New York City with well-appointed houses and apartments whose regular tenants are away; ties potential success of service to rise of 'immersion' or 'experiential' travel, designed to give travelers authentic experiences that make them feel less like tourists.
lead_paragraph: Some visitors to the city stay in well-appointed houses and apartments while the occupants are elsewhere, submerging themselves perfectly in the mind-set of a certain kind of New Yorker.

headline.print_headline: New Frontier For Tourists: Your Home
headline.seo: Your Home, the New Frontier for Tourists in New York City
headline.main: New Frontier for Tourists: Your Home
